QuestData.Title: Road Rations
QuestData.Description: We do not have time to wait around for the Admiral to recover.$B$BSully and I are planning to search for Anduin to the north, but we'll need supplies for our journey.$B$BThe lake here is teeming with wildlife, which we have received permission to hunt.$B$BGo and gather some supplies while Sully and I finalize our preparations.
QuestData.CompletionText: Time is short. Each hour we delay, the White Pawn may move further away.$B$BWhere are the supplies I asked for?
